title: The Adventures of Ivan Ward: The Counselor Hero

story.text: Ivan Ward, a dedicated instructor, starts his week by teaching a conflict resolution class, unaware that he would soon need to apply these skills in a real-world scenario.
While advising a troubled youth, Ivan discovers his ability to absorb and alleviate the emotional pain of others, which helps the young person find a new positive outlook on life.
News of his powers spreads, and he's approached by local authorities to help mediate between feuding community groups. His intervention prevents a potential outbreak of violence.
Ivan feels the strain of his powers as he balances his day job with his newfound role as a local peacemaker. He begins to train himself to control and enhance his abilities.
With improved control, Ivan successfully negotiates a tense standoff at a local park, saving the community from a dangerous escalation. The media dub him 'The Counselor Hero'.
Embracing his role, Ivan holds a community workshop to teach others basic mediation and emotional relief techniques, promoting peace and understanding.
As he reflects on the week, Ivan realizes the potential impact he can have. He decides to dedicate more time to training others, spreading his message of peace further.

ending: And thus, Ivan Ward became an unlikely hero, changing his community one heart at a time.
moral: Sometimes, the greatest power is the ability to bring peace.
